attributes.action: Allow carers to receive their allowance after retirement age.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I took early retirement to care for my Diabetic, Blind and Epileptic husband when be became too ill to cope. After 2 months I reached 60 and with a State pension my carers allowance ceased. Do we cease to 'care' then?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
